articles.title: South Africans fear spike in HIV infections as US aid cuts bite - BBC
articles.description: South Africa has been at the forefront of the successful battle to halt the spread of HIV/Aids - until now.
articles.content:
Mayeni Jones
Gugu used to collect her antiretrovirals from a USAID-funded clinic in central Johannesburg.
But when President Trump's cuts to aid funding were announced earlier this year, she and th… [+9311 chars]
